name: centauro
description: A library for the Centauro API
author: Luan Muniz <luan@luanmuniz.com.br> (http://github.com/luanmuniz)

scripts.cover: istanbul cover _mocha -- -R spec test/* && istanbul check-coverage --statement 70 --branch 65 --line 70 --function 70
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run david && npm run mocha && npm run cover
scripts.preversion: git pull && rm -rf ./node_modules/ && npm install && npm test
scripts.postversion: git push && npm publish --access=public && git push --tags
